page.title: 09Day In The Life Of A Parent
page.content: I usually get up about 7:30. I do not eat breakfast but I have a cup of tea. I take the dog out and get my children up for school. I make their breakfast and then they go to school. After that I get peace to watch the rest of T.V.am. Then I make the beds and do the housework while listning to Radio 1. After that I have dinner. After dinner I go shopping if there's anything I need. On the way up to the shops I go in to see my mother. After I've been up the town I take my son home from school. He is younger than my daughter and he comes out of school earlier. When I get home I have a cup of tea. Then I make the tea and my daughter comes home from school at 4:00. After tea I sit down and watch the "telly". I go to bed at around 11:00.
